title: Floral Symphony Haar - A Regal Diamond and Gemstone Necklace
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
GH color) and an array of multi-colored Sapphires (Pink
and Green hues). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional shine and durability.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a floral-inspired design, with each gemstone carefully placed to create a harmonious blend of colors. The intricate lattice framework is adorned with diamonds, enhancing the overall brilliance. Features a modern take on traditional Indian botanical motifs, offering a contemporary yet timeless aesthetic.
colors: creating a vibrant and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: and special celebrations. A stunning choice for the bride (Vadhuvu) or to elevate any festive occasion (Panduga). Also suitable for high-end parties and formal events.
description: This haaram represents a fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and modern jewelry design. The use of high-quality diamonds and colorful sapphires ensures a lasting sparkle and enduring value. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees superior shine and longevity. A statement piece that embodies elegance and cultural richness.
